186028607.review: Rise of the Tomb Raider is, in my opinion, the best entry in the Survivor Trilogy. It’s a clear upgrade from its predecessor, with meticulously crafted environments that are simply gorgeous to explore. The world feels engaging, making exploration endlessly enjoyable with plenty of activities to dive into. The tombs are significantly improved, featuring puzzles that strike a better balance and avoid the overly simplistic design of the previous game. The story is captivating, pulling you into Lara’s journey with every twist and turn. From a technical perspective, the developers made great strides, particularly with the animations: facial expressions are much more detailed and lifelike. The game also offers a wider variety of weapons, which are fun to use and come with exciting new upgrades. The Score Attack mode is quite challenging but fun, while the DLCs add extra layers of enjoyment. The Croft Manor DLC stands out with delightful Easter eggs referencing earlier titles, including the classics. Overall, Rise of the Tomb Raider is an outstanding action-adventure game. I recommend playing it on the hardest difficulty for a true survivor experience.

185954617.review:
7/10

Improves on everything that was introduced in the first game. 
With that said... Combat is still too easy, even on hard. Exploration and platforming is still fairly mindless thanks to rather extreme hand-holding. Puzzles are better but Lara tends to spoil the fun rather easily by giving clues. Also, the over-the-top set-piece moments are still ridiculous and stupid. Lara can't seem to exit any place without it blowing up somehow...

185951508.review:
Dawne Tomb Raider jest przejrzyste, spójne, progresywne i wciągające.
Obecnie giganty w branży chyba pomyliły grę z pokazem możliwości graficznych czy mechanicznych.
Piękna grafika, dobry dubbing, płynna grafika, niezła fabuła.
Co z tego. Grywalność 2/10.
Gra nudzi bo karze zbierać i polować. Każda nowa pułapka to zgon bo nie zrobiłeś na padzie np. XA.  
Przecież powinieneś wiedzieć.
Likwidowanie przeciwników to nuda. Wszystko polega na odpowiednim wciskaniu.
Udziwnienia utrudniające płynną grę. 
Lokacje zagmatwane, zaśmiecone jakbym przeszukiwał wysypisko.
Obiekty nie pasują do otoczenia.
Mam się skradać czy skakać ale nie wiem które obiekty są interaktywne.
Jak skoczysz na lodową ścianę to jak nie wciśniesz klawisza to nie użyje toporka.
I wszędzie te głupoty w stylu -"nie masz ładunków wybuchowych czy liny ze strzałą" i nie możesz przejść
przez parę krzaków.
Strzelają do ciebie z karabinów a po zabiciu zbierasz z nich strzały.

Pochwalić mogę tylko silnik gry. Niektóre jaskinie, efekty śniegu, światło, Larę czy npc.

Ta gra to jak ciastka z marketów, ładne opakowanie a gdy spróbujesz to szczucznizna
jakbyś jadł plastyk.
Jedynie co mnie cieszy że zwolni się miejsce na dysku ( 50 GB).
Spróbuje na wariata ukończyć grę pomijając wszystkie poboczne misje. Chyba, że gra mnie zdąży
wkur...ć na maxa.

185942047.review:
Harvoin jatko-osat on parempia, mutta tässä tapauksessa on käynyt niin.
Eli Tomb Raideriin (2013) nähden tarina on paljon mielenkiintoisempi, pelattavaa on enemmän mutta ei semmoista mikä alkaa puuduttaa kuin vaikka Assassin's Creed-sarjan peleissä.

Ääninäyttely ja ylipäätään äänet ovat tässä huippuluokkaa. Ja vaikka pelillä on jo ikää, niin siitäkin huolimatta peli on todella komean näköinenkin.

Mutta kaikki ei ole niin ruusuista. Nimittäin vaikka koneeni on Ryzen 7 5700X + Radeon RX 7900 GRE + Fedora 41 KDE niin peli hidasteli paljon 1440p resolla.
Jos textuurit olivat very high:lla niin peli kirjaimellisesti tökki. Sitten taas high textuureilla ei ollut tuota ongelmaa enää. Mutta peli hyytyi kuin seinään kun mentiin isoille aukeille kuten neuvosto tukikohtaan.
Ja sama ongelma vaivas linux ja windows versiossa.

Sama suorituskyky ongelma ei ole sitten läsnä kolmannessa osassa Shadow of the Tomb Raiderissa mikä seuraavaksi on menossa peluuseen.
Mutta voin tätä peliä suositella kun Laran ohjastaminen oli sujuvaa, tarina hyvä ja grafiikat sekä äänet olivat mahtavat.
Eivätkä ne hidastelut pilanneet pelikokemusta.

Rise of the Tomb Raider – это как хороший приключенческий фильм: динамичный, красивый и немного предсказуемый. Если любите загадки, экшен и саркастичные комментарии Лары, берите не раздумывая. Да, даже если вы не собирались спасать мир – Лара всё равно сделает это за вас. 😉

Из плюсов: Неплохая графика, захватывающий сюжет: вечные тайны, злодеи и семейные драмы – идеальный рецепт для приключений. Разнообразие локаций: от заснеженных пиков до древних руин. 

Из минусов: Иногда кажется, что она главный поставщик разрушений для ЮНЕСКО.
Повторяющиеся головоломки: почувствуй себя сантехником, пока крутишь вентили.
АИ врагов иногда тупит: если спрятаться в кустах, они забудут о твоём существовании за пару секунд.

185700704.review:
[h1]🏔️ Rise of the Tomb Raider™ : Entre Glaciers et Mystères Ancestraux 🔎[/h1]
[p]Temps de jeu : Environ 15 à 20 heures pour l’histoire principale, mais comptez jusqu’à 40 heures si vous êtes un perfectionniste qui explore chaque tombeau et collectionne tous les secrets.[/p]
[p]Genre : Action-aventure avec exploration, énigmes et combats intenses.[/p]

[h2]Les points positifs :[/h2]
[p]🌍 Une aventure visuellement éblouissante : Des montagnes glacées de Sibérie aux vallées luxuriantes, chaque environnement est une œuvre d’art. Les tempêtes de neige et les effets de lumière rendent l’immersion totale.[/p]
[p]💡 Le retour des tombeaux : Lara retrouve sa passion pour l’archéologie avec des tombeaux complexes, riches en énigmes et en histoire. Chaque tombeau raconte une histoire et rappelle les origines de la série.[/p]
[p]🔫 Un gameplay équilibré : Exploration, combats dynamiques et crafting s’entremêlent parfaitement. Lara est plus redoutable que jamais avec des arcs, des armes et des gadgets améliorables.[/p]
[p]📜 Une histoire captivante : Lara poursuit l’héritage de son père en cherchant la source divine. Les thèmes de la foi et de l’immortalité apportent une profondeur intéressante, en écho aux mystères historiques des premiers jeux.[/p]
[p]🎵 Une ambiance sonore immersive : La musique dramatique et les sons naturels renforcent chaque moment, qu’il s’agisse d’une exploration silencieuse ou d’un combat désespéré.[/p]

[h2]Les points négatifs :[/h2]
[p]🔄 Des quêtes secondaires inégales : Bien que certaines offrent des récompenses intéressantes, d’autres semblent être de simples tâches répétitives.[/p]
[p]🤖 Un manque de variété chez les ennemis : Affronter les mercenaires de la Trinité devient redondant à mesure que l’histoire avance.[/p]
[p]🐾 Un scénario prévisible : Bien que l’histoire soit solide, certains rebondissements sont faciles à anticiper pour les fans aguerris.[/p]

[h2]Le prix :[/h2]
[p]Souvent disponible pour 20 € ou moins avec ses extensions, Rise of the Tomb Raider™ est une excellente affaire pour une aventure aussi mémorable.[/p]

[h2]🏆 Le platine :[/h2]
[p]Obtenir le "platine" est un défi respectable. En plus de l’histoire, vous devrez explorer tous les recoins, résoudre des énigmes, et réussir des défis de survie intenses. Préparez-vous à y consacrer 50 à 70 heures, avec un brin de frustration pour certaines zones bien cachées. Mais pour un aventurier digne de ce nom, c’est un défi gratifiant. 🏔️[/p]

[p]En résumé, Rise of the Tomb Raider™ réussit à raviver l'esprit classique de la série tout en le modernisant. Les fans reconnaîtront des clins d’œil aux jeux iconiques, comme la quête incessante de Lara pour percer les mystères anciens et son obsession pour les reliques mystérieuses. Si vous avez grandi avec la Lara polygonale des années 90, celle-ci est prête à gravir de nouveaux sommets avec style. Alors, préparez votre arc, enfilez vos crampons, et partez à la conquête des secrets oubliés. 🌟🪓[/p]

古墓丽影10：崛起。是新三部曲的第二部，剧情上无联系，游戏性承接上部，操作，画面上都类似，地图内容以及枪械上有了很大扩充，相当于第一部的2倍左右。打折很划算，包含的DLC有好几个，每个都不同类型：血脉相传（纯寻找物品，发掘劳拉父母的故事），劳拉的恶梦（射击打僵尸），暗冷（相当于一个任务，破坏苏联设备），生存挑战（相当于慢慢长夜）。个人感觉上10还是比9好点，古墓挑战恰到好处，有几个还是有难度的，剧情也很棒，感觉就是正规编剧出来的，单线程也让人有玩下去的动力。

ps,做完全收集30小时左右吧（叙利亚忘记的可以通关后过去），全成就就太难了，包含DLC内容，没啥必要。网上攻略很多。另外给中文配音打个好评，希望以后大作都有中文配音。

185680615.review:
Na minha opinião o melhor tomb raider dentre os três do grupo Survivor(tomb raider 2013, rise of the tomb raider e Shadow of the Tomb Raider).

História 
A trama é bem envolvendo e muito bem desenvolvida conseguindo explorar os traumas da Lara com seu passado(Bem aprofundado também na dlc mansão lara croft) e boa parte do jogo se passa na Sibéria na Rússia, algo que gosto muito é que eles pegam muitas referências históricas sobre aquela região, casas, estilo de vida, e a riqueza de detalhes em documentos narrados e relíquias é muito boa dando uma grande imersão nisso, seguindo o que seu antecessor o Tomb Raider 2013 fazia. Na história encontramos um antagonismo com a Trindade sobe liderança de Konstantin que faz um bom papel de contra-ponto a Lara Croft. Um único ponto negativo que não me incomoda tanto(pois já zerei três vezes) é da falta apenas no final de digamos você intervir na trama final, você derrota Konstantil e tudo, mas o final é uma cutscene( no começo deixa uma sensação que você não teve controle sobre a situação), mas não deixa nada a dever já que existiram lá atras muitas batalhas épicas. Algo que eu considero um ponto positivos é que em algumas partes quando você analisa eles pegaram alguns elementos da história do Tomb Raider 2013 mas que eu não percebi na trama jogando e não ficaram repetitivos, eles usaram a formula na dose, como é o caso dos soldados imortais, a ideia deles é quase igual aos samurais da ilha no 2013, até a cena deles na ponte é idêntica, alguns criticam isso, mas eu não achei que eles conseguiram saturar ou algo do tipo, usaram a mesma premissa mas foi na dosagem correta.

Gameplay 
Os controles são de fácil aprendizado e não são complexos. Existem vários modos de se lutar no jogo, explorando um Stealth(que é melhor aproveitado no Shadow of the Tomb Raider, no Rise é tiro e porrada mesmo) mas em grande parte do jogo vemos um destaque na luta corpo a corpo(bem satisfatória) e no arsenal que é deverás imenso kkkk com muitas armas pistolas, arcos, roupas, rifles tem gente que acha um ponto negativo pois o Tomb Raider de 2013 tinha uma simplicidade nisso eram poucas coisas, mas eu acho bem interessante esse amplo arsenal. Resumindo Rise of the Tomb Raider é tiroteio e ação 

Ambientação 
Os cenários são muito lindos,variando bastante do calor da Síria até o gelo da Sibéria passando por algumas passagens com cidades exuberantes .

100%
O cem porcento é bem demorado e se você é uma pessoa como eu que gosta de ler, apreciar as paisagens e ver os artefatos vai gostar, fora os desafios que tem na maioria dos mapas. Com relação as conquistas da Steam tem muitas difíceis e você vai ter que gastar umas horas para completar elas. Algo que aprecio também são as tumbas que são muito lindas e agora quando completas você aprende uma habilidade antiga daquele povo ou do que aquela construção representava, como por exemplo conhecimento anatômico, medicinal, cura da dor, são habilidades realmente interessantes e que te recompensam pela tumba, algo que não existia no Tomb Raider de 2013, quando você fazia uma tumba recebia só alguns espólios, eu pessoalmente quando completava sentia que faltava uma recompensa a mais.

Veredito 
O jogo é muito bom, eu esperaria algumas promoções já que ele fica num excelente preço( geralmente 19 reais), a história é cativante, vai te entreter por um bom tempo e provavelmente você vai querer jogar os jogos da franquia tanto os novos quanto os antigos. Simplesmente Videogame

Gameplay: O game possui mecânicas muito parecidas com o tomb raider 2013, então se você ja jogou o antigo vai gostar desse, a jogabilidade é bem fluida, tanto no combate quanto na parte de escalada. No quesito de level design, os mapas são bem detalhados e a quantidade de inimigos por área é boa, só no final do jogo que achei um pouco exagerado em questão de inimigos, mas de resto esta bem legal.
As mecânicas de combate são bem simples porem muito boas, eu joguei o game no controle e achei bem tranquilo de usar todas as armas que temos disponível.
Na parte de evolução de personagem temos muitos pontos positivos, tanto a arvore de habilidades que achei bem interessante, quanto ao desbloqueio de novos equipamentos ao longo do jogo, você sente que sempre tem algo novo por vir.

Gráficos: Joguei o game em uma 4060 e um ryzen 5 500, no full hd com praticamente tudo no máximo. O jogo é muito bonito, mesmo sendo um pouco mais antigo eu achei os visuais incríveis, tanto as texturas quanto os reflexos e iluminação são muito bem feitos, isso junto ao level design bom que o jogo tem, fica muito legal.

185480485.review:
Rise of The Tomb Raider is a masterclass in terms of story and narrative direction, you are no longer responsible for protecting and creating Lara's turning point, she is now this resourceful character, that uses the world to her advantage, making every part of progression a key point in keeping her alive in a Siberian wilderness vast with Soviet installations, caves, crypts and forests. Lara is using research and knowledge stemming from her father to find out who Trinity is and what they have to do with his death and the final artifact, The Divine Source. Whilst it is perceived as she follows her father, it gives her reason to begin these expeditions and to finish what he started, giving her closure whilst also taking what's hers and developing her as the Tomb Raider we all know and love. 

The world is vast, open and dangerous, coated in mystery that you unearth by exploration and character progression, collecting new weapons, building her skill tree and using guerrilla combat to avoid large encounters that can greatly affect the outcome of Lara's survival. Although the environments and areas you visit are beautiful and full of life, the game reminds you that it is not only the Deathless Ones or Trinity that you have to worry about, rather the world you're trying to open and visit. The game immerses you, pushes you to the edge of your seat and forces you to live and learn in a world of myth and reality.

Whilst you have adjoining characters, they showcase the morality of the world and its inhabitants, whilst also showcasing immortality and causing you to create relationships that forge an unlikely tone, making Lara hide them and protect them at all costs, preferring herself to be at risk than anyone else, holding onto the trauma developed throughout her life and Tomb Raider (2013).

I don't particularly have any downside, but it can feel quite linear and/or obvious at some points, though even old titles use a mix of both open and linear sections. I do however highly recommend this game to Tomb Raider fans, progressionists, story rich fans and those looking to breach out into puzzle driven action adventures.

Esse é o Tomb Raider definitivo, não consigo encontrar defeitos nesse jogo.
O equilíbrio entre exploração e ação é perfeito aqui. Ao contrário do primeiro Tomb Raider, em que a ação era 100% forçada, com tudo explodindo a todo momento, aqui é tudo mais cadenciado, nunca enjoando porque o jogo sempre varia o tom entre explorar e lutar.
Os gráficos são belíssimos. Joguei esse game a primeira vez no Xbox One e ele já era bonito lá. No PC então nem se fala. A dublagem é sensacional, parece coisa de filme.
O primeiro Tomb Raider tinha inúmeros personagens secundários inúteis e sem carisma, mas esse erro foi corrigido aqui. Dessa vez podemos contar praticamente apenas 3 personagens secundários e todos são muito legais. E sem falar de Konstantin, um vilão de muito respeito.
A história é intrigante, me lembrando muito dos primeiros filmes do Indiana Jones, muito boa mesmo.
Jogabilidade muito fluida e divertida. Eu sempre joguei em consoles e com controles, mas nesse jogo resolvi jogar com mouse e teclado pra ver se aprendia, e consegui zerar o game me divertindo muito.
Em suma, Rise of the Tomb Raider é uma joia, indispensável pra qualquer fã de Lara Croft ou de jogos de aventura. Nota 10/10

185443836.review:
Con rise of the tomb raider ho concluso anch’io la trilogia reboot delle avventure di Lara Croft, penso che ormai sia risaputo quanto questa saga ormai mi sia entrata nel cuore ed è proprio questa trilogia ad avermela fatta rivalutare nel tempo. Avendo già giocato il primo (la recensione è sul profilo) e shadow su ps4 mi sono appassionato molto a questa saga spesso blasonata negli anni e dunque è riuscito questo videogioco a soddisfare le mie aspettative? Scopritelo leggendo questa recensione
[h1] Trama [/h1]
Questo capitolo di tomb raider si colloca un’anno dopo gli eventi dell’isola di Yamatai dove Lara Croft scopre tramite vecchie ricerche e appunti di suo padre la leggenda di un profeta immortale regnante nei primi anni 1000 a Costantinopoli e fondatore della mitica città di Kitezh, recandosi in Siria per rovistare la tomba di tale profeta scopre poi di non essere sola e il motivo principale della scomparsa di Richard Croft: un gruppo di mercenari conosciuto come “la trinità” vuole impossessarsi della sorgente divina un antico manufatto il quale dovrebbe essere la chiave dell’immortalità situato nell’antica città Kitez; Lara dunque si reca in Siberia ma all’arrivo scopre poi di non essere sola perché dopo aver incontrato Konstantin il capo della trinità scopre che esso vuole a tutti i costi l’antico oggetto. Ho cercato di riassumere la trama nella maniera più chiara possibile, e descritta così potrà sembrare una storia abbastanza piatta che sà di “già visto” ma vi assicuro che è molto di più: è stata a dir poco coinvolgente, interessante da seguire e dato il ritmo appassionante me lo sono goduto al massimo. 
[h1] Gameplay [/h1]
L’aspetto più interessante della saga per me è sempre stato il suo gameplay ed in questo capitolo ne fa davvero da padrone: cominciamo con lo stealth, quella che ho preferito di più e che in questo capitolo ho trovato molto funzionale rispetto agli altri 2 dato che le uccisioni furtive sono efficaci, quiete e permettono di avere uno stile di gioco non letale. Se si opta l’approccio action allora vedrete uno shooting molto solido, adrenalinico e che mette in risalto l’anima action del gioco. Si aggiungono a questo anche un’ottima componente di crafting e uno sfruttamento apogeo del rampino, uno strumento davvero utile. Riassumendo: lo stile del gameplay è molto variegato con una formula smussata che rende il gioco godibile in qualsiasi approccio
[h1] Comparto tecnico [/h1]
Su questo parte il mio punto di vista è una visione un po’ altalenante dato che ho dovuto giocarlo su un pc portatile perché con la mia configurazione attuale il gioco non girava a prestazioni alte, anzi mi dava frequenti cali di frame rate durante le sessioni di gioco e degli input lag nelle scene di intermezzo; a patto di chiudere un’occhio girava in maniera accettabile a prestazioni “basse” ed una risoluzione 1600X1200 pixel seppur la qualità non fosse molto godibile. Su un pc portatile di fascia medio alta invece a prestazioni alte la qualità era nettamente superiore nonostante non abbia tutti i requisiti richiesti dal gioco. Comunque dopo questo excursus da pcsta smanettone, parliamo degli aspetti grafici del titolo: per essere un titolo del 2016 mi ha veramente meravigliato sotto questo aspetto dato che esteticamente è abbastanza realistico, il mondo di gioco è vivo e con molta interazione ambientale e un comparto fisico che definirei verosimile
[h1] Conduzione artistica [/h1]
Voglio scrivere due righe anche sul lato artistico ma non mi ci dilungherò molto dato che parlerò solo di 3 cose: in primo luogo le impeccabili animazioni che esteticamente parlando ho trovato splendide quelle facciali e molto dinamiche quelle di combattimento, il world building seppur non sia open world mostra scorci gradevoli e per finire voglio parlare della struttura delle tombe: la struttura architettonica è inventiva e l’ingegnoso meccanismo di funzionamento impreziosisce gli enigmi ambientali facendoli passare come un leggero e rilassante passatempo dopo qualche scontro a fuoco
[h1] Verdetto [/h1]
In conclusione io reputo rise of the tomb raider un ottimo videogioco perché: presenta una storia interessante, coinvolgente e matura sotto ogni aspetto; un gameplay solido e dinamico che permette la fruizione dell’opera in qualsiasi approccio si voglia, una struttura di gioco esteticamente realistica e artisticamente genuina. Per queste motivazioni lo considero rise of the tomb raider il miglior videogioco di tutta la saga nonché la miglior avventura di Lara Croft di questa trilogia reboot
Voto 8,7/10

185433063.review:
1 轻量化的界面设计
游戏界面十分“清爽”：游戏大部分时候，是没有ui的存在的，甚至于连任务提示的显示都没有。当然这个和游戏类型、玩法有很大的关系，劳拉是走到哪拆到哪的拆家体质，地图普遍没有回头路可走，在关卡的出口偏偏又是剧情触发点，玩家的游戏目标一致很明确（向前走就行），也确实不需要像《赛博朋克 2077》等游戏一样，在游戏界面挂一个任务提示。

2 顺势而为的剧情引导
《古墓丽影 崛起》的剧情引导克制且自然：在游戏的开头，劳拉与朋友一起登山，劳拉踏上山顶之后，镜头推动，显现出一条可以前行的道路。而后，朋友约翰往雪山之上行走，暗示女主一起登山，而后，游戏中的第一个任务出现：“前往山顶” 。

这一段剧情引入与任务的衔接设计得很巧妙：通过女主与朋友之间的互动引入游戏的目的，告知玩家劳拉有不得不登山的理由，在勾起玩家的好奇心的同时，角色行动的大方向--前往山顶。朋友约翰往雪山之上行走的动作把玩家视线引导到通往雪山的小路上，结合场景萦绕的氛围“引力”，玩家有一个往前走的本能--沿着路前往山顶。综合以上这两个步骤，游戏内的第一个任务才开始出现。

有个话叫：因势利导,顺势而为，用来形容这段剧情的设计处理是在合适不过了。

3 随教随用的游戏引导
《古墓丽影 崛起》的操作并不难，在新手阶段的教学也是一次只教学一个小点。并且游戏只会在需要操作的节点上弹出对应的指引，以引导玩家完成后续的流程。（主打的一个就是，你真的需要用到才告诉你，不会预先巴啦啦说一大堆把人绕晕后让你上路）

同类的指引会根据游戏的具体时间适时再出现2-3次。一般一个指引之后，较长一段时间内不会再出现相关提示，而在下个关卡遇到类似的情况时，会再次触发相关提示，以养成玩家的行为习惯 。

4 隐晦的语音提醒
在探索游戏过程中，制作者会在一些关键节点上安排劳拉说话，暗示一些解谜的方法。这种方式的频率并不高，（频率太高的话，劳拉就变成喜欢自说自话的话痨了，实在和人设不符合），甚至可能某些地方只有手残多次失败、或者摆烂、挂机，导致系统实在看不过去才会触发。

如在一场激烈战斗的时候，劳拉会提示：“耐心一点，让他们自己靠近你”来暗示玩家，这个战场的主要解谜途径：暗杀。虽然提示很隐晦，但是又能让玩家在仔细体验游戏的时候得到帮助。

5 小结
《古墓丽影 崛起》整体体验起来很舒服，游戏目标与剧情目标高度一致（全收集的强迫症除外），手残党在跌跌撞撞后，能在不怀疑自己智商的情况下，收获一批风景截图作为战利品，顺利通关。

185432350.review:
An Exceptional Adventure That Elevates the Series

Rise of the Tomb Raider builds on everything that made the 2013 reboot great while refining the formula and delivering a more ambitious, polished, and rewarding experience. This game is a near-perfect blend of exploration, action, and storytelling, making it a must-play for fans of adventure games.

The first thing that stands out is the breathtaking world design. The environments are absolutely stunning, from the frozen Siberian wilderness to ancient ruins hidden deep within the mountains. Every location feels rich with detail and atmosphere, inviting you to explore every nook and cranny. The weather effects, lighting, and textures make this one of the most visually impressive games of its time, and the sense of scale is awe-inspiring.

Exploration is where the game truly shines. The optional tombs are a standout feature, offering cleverly designed puzzles that are both challenging and satisfying to solve. They feel like a throwback to classic Tomb Raider games, while also fitting seamlessly into the modern, narrative-driven structure. The mix of platforming, climbing, and puzzle-solving is perfectly balanced, giving you a true sense of accomplishment when you discover a hidden tomb or secret treasure.

The combat and stealth mechanics are fluid and engaging. Lara is more capable than ever, with a wide array of weapons, gadgets, and crafting options at her disposal. Whether you prefer taking out enemies with stealthy bow kills or going loud with an assault rifle, the game gives you the tools to play your way. The crafting system, which lets you create everything from healing items to explosive arrows, adds another layer of strategy to encounters.

The story is gripping and emotional, with Lara’s personal journey taking center stage. Camilla Luddington delivers another fantastic performance as Lara, portraying her as a determined and vulnerable protagonist. The main plot, revolving around the search for the Divine Source and the mystery of Lara’s father, is engaging and filled with twists. The supporting cast and villains are well-developed, and the game does a great job of weaving its narrative into the gameplay.

Side activities, such as hunting, collecting relics, and completing challenges, provide plenty of reasons to explore the world beyond the main story. The progression system feels rewarding, allowing you to unlock new skills and gear that make Lara feel progressively stronger while still keeping the gameplay balanced.

On the technical side, Rise of the Tomb Raider runs beautifully on PC, with excellent optimization and a wide range of graphical settings. The game’s cinematic presentation, combined with smooth gameplay, makes it a joy to play from start to finish.

Overall, Rise of the Tomb Raider is a phenomenal sequel that improves on its predecessor in every way. It’s a visually stunning, action-packed, and emotionally resonant adventure that delivers an unforgettable experience. Whether you’re a longtime fan of the series or new to Lara’s journey, this is an adventure you won’t want to miss.

최적화 : 고퀄임에도 불구하고 프레임 드롭이나
버그도 거의 없이 아주아주 훌륭함

플탐 : 가격대비 아주아주 훌륭함.
본편 뿐만 아니라 툼레이더 팬들을 위한
탐사모드, 저택 dlc 등등 다양한 콘텐츠들을 함께 즐길수 있어 2회차, 3회차 등이 가능하게
제작됨.

난이도 : 탐험 위주 또는 툼레이더 모드 등등 여러가지로 세분화되서 선택지가 훨씬 다양해졌으며
난이도 선택에 따라 다회차도 가능하게 만들어놈.
스킬은 다양해지고 제작 재료들이 있어야 해서
어려워짐. 동물전투가 추가됬는데 적과의 전투보다 더 어려운것 같음.

퍼즐 : 전편도 그랬지만 똑같이 어렵다고 느낌.
게임성 : 패드를 사용중인데 굉장히 박진감 넘치고 생동감있는 연출로 엄청난 게임성을 지님.

단점
1. 100% 탐험 완료를 추구하는 사람으로써,
도저히 올라갈 길이 없거나 파괴되서 건너가지 못하는 부분은 추가적인 탐사 진행이 불가하다고 느낀 부분이 있음

2. 제작하거나 임무를 통해 보상으로 받아야지만 해금되는 스킬이나 도구들이 있고
재료들을 모아야 하는 등 다양하고 까다로워져서, 
유물들을 추후 스킬 해금 후에 찾으러 다시 왔다갔다 하느라 고생을 했고,
그놈의 스킬때문에 못얻고 이미 지나서 파괴된 길은 돌아갈수가 없어서 유물 그냥 포기 한것도 있음. 그게 좀 빡침;

3. 동굴 등에 폭탄을 날려야 입구가 해제되는 부분들이 많이 있는데 문제는 근처에 폭탄이 없음.
폭탄 구하려고 왔던길 다시 한참 돌아가야함;
전편처럼 그냥 불화살로도 할수 있게 하는게 더 좋았을것 같음.

4. 전편과 마찬가지로 길이 아주 그냥 미로 같고 맵이 커서 햇갈려 죽것음

전편보다 전체적으로 엄청난 퀄리티로 상향됬다고
느꼈습니다. 개인적으로 느끼기에는 전편인
툼레이더 리부트 1보다 훨씬 더 재밌습니다.
라라에게 그새 정들었는지, 우리 라라 할수있다를
매일같이 외치고 있어요.

185038042.review:
Man, Rise of the Tomb Raider is really nice. It resembles a serene yet exhilarating trek through some of the most breathtaking virtual landscapes you've ever seen. You are drawn in by the snow, the historic ruins, and the wild action scenes.

The game itself? pleasant and silky. The puzzles are "just challenging enough," the fighting is a nice balance of stealth and direct action, and exploring tombs is satisfying. What about Lara? She is both human and a complete badass. It's a journey, and you can sense her hardships and victories.

Was there anything more it could have done? Perhaps. Although enjoyable, the crafting mechanism doesn't innovate, and some of the plot lines are a little cliched. But really? When everything is so well-executed and delightful, why cares?

It's worth the trek if you're searching for an exhilarating yet laid-back adventure. Allow Lara to take you on a journey while you unwind.

184972679.review: This had to be the best game in the modern trilogy. The graphics are incredible for the time, the gameplay mechanics are much more enhanced than 2013's Tomb Raider, and they were able to successfully build off of the previous game's message that she was a survivor. The added side mode that let's you explore her family's mansion and her past also really develops that narrative. However, in my quest to 100% the game, I came across some tough challenges. The developers put a lot of emphasis on these, for a lack of a better word, dead game modes, which in some cases are fun to play. However, tying a good chunk of achievements to a multiplayer mode that no one plays and keeps disconnecting was not the right move on their part. On another note, the biggest solo challenge had to have been the gold scores, which is essentially a more than perfect run throughout the entire campaign. But overall, I loved the campaign, the story, and all the details in between, 9/10.

Just finished this masterpiece of a game. Wow! Loved it. Been Tomb Raider fan since I was a kid. Started with Legend, then played Anniversary, Underworld, TR 2013 and now Rise of Tomb Raider.

Story is good, though you figure out who the Prophet is about midway through the game. It`s kinda obvious.

All in all, great game, had fun with it, those ambushes were a pain in the ass at first, but careful management of skills and saving ammo helped a lot. 

10/10 Superb game

184927999.review:
[h1]Rating[/h1]
7/10

[h1]Intro[/h1]
It's good, but it fails to innovate over the previous game and is more tedious than said game. Don't get me wrong, if you're playing the game for the combat, story and tomb raiding, it's still a fun time. Those aspects are on par with the previous game. But if you were hoping for a much more sophisticated open world to explore, like in the previous game, then you'll most likely be as disappointed as I was.

[h1]Positives[/h1]
+ Good story.
+ Weapons have good impact.
+ Great aesthetics and graphics.
+ Doesn't severely limit ammo for the weapons that aren't the bow.
+ Weapon upgrades in each category are carried across all weapons of that category.
+ Good weapon variety. There's now several choices of each weapon slot to choose from.

[h1]Negatives[/h1]
- Each item now requires specific materials in order to be crafted. Which makes gathering materials less convenient.
- A lot of the new movement mechanics are just different contextual ways to traverse the levels. They don't actually add to the gameplay.
- Open world is much bigger but less fun to explore than the previous game. There are tons of dead ends that make you go back the way you came, which pads out the experience.
- The Challenge collectables have no description or hint of their locations. Aside from constantly spamming Survival Instinct mode. This is especially a problem, when the open world design is significantly worse than the previous game.

184888953.review:
Estava durante muito tempo na minha Lista de Desejos, já que o Tomb Raider 2013 acabou se tornando um dos meus jogos preferidos em toda minha vida. Uma das poucas coisas diferentes do de 2013, é q temos uma conexão maior com a história de Lara, sendo a morte dos seus pais e sua relação agridoce com o conceito "Família". Porém, oq ele ganha em história familiar, ele perde em todo o resto. Desde dinâmicas idênticas com o de 2013, até mesmo história da trama principal bastante preguiçosa! Dentre outras diversas coisas, q me fez cansar antes mesmo de acabar, saía correndo ignorando o tiroteio pra só terminar pelo menos a campanha principal. Foi uma grande quebra de expectativa, prefiro o primeiro com a história mais redonda e uma dinâmica mais simples, porém mais conexa e menos cansativa.

Citarei alguns exemplos:
1- História estranha -> Começamos esse jogo com o amigo da Lara, o Jonah, mas por um empecilho, nos separamos e durante 90% do jogo parece q esqueceram da existência dele (Sem mencionar q mudaram até a etnia dele nesse jogo). Tiveram várias tentativas nesse jogo de Plots Twist, mas uma era pior q a outra, até chegar em um momento de eles só jogarem em nossa cara, sinto q eles quiseram colocar coisas mas nem se quer pensaram em como as concluiriam. E sem falar q parece muito Piratas do Caribi, mas com a Lara no lugar do Jack Sparrow. Sei q parece forçado, mas uma galera q decide tomar pra si a fonte da imortalidade pra livrar o mundo do mal e do pecado, é uma forma muito bosta e broxate de explicar a vontade dessa galera

2- Dinâmicas repetitivas -> Cara, se vc deletar todas as coisas que parece que copiaram e colaram do de 2013, não teria quase nada. Exemplo disso: ao chegar em determinada parte da história, acrescentarão um outro povo diferente dos que lhe foram apresentado durante todo o jogo (a galera lá imortal), vc logo vai perceber que a forma q foram apresentados se parecem muito com os Samurais do primeiro jogo, até a cena deles marchando em uma ponte se assemelha com a famosa cena da Lara se esgueirando entre os guerreiros que estavam se preparando pro ritual.

3- Dinâmicas novas totalmente esquecíveis e desnecessárias -> Cara, pra que tanta arma e roupa????? Uma quantidade absurda de arco, de pistola, de fuzil, de escopeta, de roupa. Inclusive a nova opção de flechas que seriam as de fumaça venenosa, q no meio de tanta coisa, chega esquecer q vc as tem. Você pode fazer bomba, amardilha com veneno, coquetel molotov, munição. Pra mim, prefiro o de 2013 q limitam bem mais a quantidade de coisas, mas acabava desafiando vc usar todas perfeitamente e estrategicamente, e não só chegar parecendo um carro alegórico de carnaval

184884803.review:
Rise of the Tomb Raider é uma sequência direta do reboot de Tomb Raider de 2013, trazendo uma Lara croft iniciante e abordando uma temática de sobrevivência, apesar de se tratar de um jogo de ação,

Não vou entrar em detalhes da história do jogo, porque isso é particularidade de cada um que for jogar, mas vamos aos principais pontos positivos do jogo.

1- Gráficos e fotografia do jogo são muito bem feitos, tudo é muito bem detalhado e bonito, proporcionando uma imersão muito boa ao jogador.

2- A duração do jogo é Ok, e vai te entreter durante cerca de 10 a 15 horas de gameplay.

3-  A trilha sonora é boa, mas fica abaixo do primeiro jogo.

PONTOS NEGATIVOS (AO MEU VER)

Evolução da protagonista, praticamente a Lara Croft regride após o primeiro, as vezes, parece que os eventos do primeiro jogo não ocorreram, a personagem continua egoista e sem personalidade.

O combate do jogo, por vez é interessante e agradável, mas peca em muitos sentido, principalmente no stealth, onde você fica muito limitado porque os inimigos tem aim bot e miram direto onde você está, mesmo que você esteja escondido, então, tem momentos onde você faz um abate furtivo, caso algum inimigo veja o corpo, ele vai saber e mirar exatamente onde você está, o que deixa a experiência frustrante e te priva de fazer certas estratégia.

Em resumo, é um jogo que traz uma experiência de ação e aventura muito concisa, com uma jogabilidade e ambientação boas de acordo com a proposta do jogo, trazendo puzzles interessantes e que não te fazem perder muito tempo, com uma exploração interessante, podendo encontrar peças de armas para melhorar a sua gameplay até o final do jogo.

Se você busca um jogo mais leve, com menos de 20h pra zerar a história, esse jogo vai servir muito bem o entretenimento e a aventura proposta nesse universo.

By far my absolute favourite of the survivor trilogy. I don't know how they did it but Crystal really just got it just right with this game. They improved and expanded on what worked for the previous game, adding a wonderful variety of environments and locations for Lara to explore.

This is the only one of the 3 games that I have replayed the most, for no other reason than I enjoy it. The story is engaging, he characters fascinating and the combat exciting. I honestly don't know if I have anything negative to say about this game. It holds up SO so well for its time, and if you have a decent PC the graphics turned up to their max make this one of the most beautiful games I have ever had the joy to play. 

Some of the more classic OG fans may not appreciate the combat sections but for me I loved them. Particularly the use of stealth and planning how you will attack whilst taking the least damage possible. The added bonus of gaining more XP for stealth/head shots was a really nice incentive for taking your time with the combat instead of going in guns blazing. 

Lara is 100% pure badass in this installment too, much more so than in the previous game. Its refreshing and a lot of fun to embody here for a little while when immersed in the game. I loved her outfits and the weapons and the use of upgrades and even the little shop to buy weapons and tools. 

I recomend Rise for not just people who already know Lara, but also people who don't know her that well. You won't regret aquainting yourself with her and the story she wants to tell you.

184843304.review:
Review: "Tomb Raider: Rise of the Tomb Raider" vs "Hatred"

Tomb Raider: Rise of the Tomb Raider
"Rise of the Tomb Raider," released in 2015, is the highly anticipated sequel to 2013's "Tomb Raider" reboot, continuing Lara Croft’s journey to uncover lost ancient secrets. The game is a beautiful, well-polished action-adventure experience with a compelling storyline that follows Lara's quest to find the secret of immortality, a theme that ties to her father's mysterious legacy.

Strengths

Stunning Visuals: The game’s environments are breathtaking, from snowy mountains to dense forests and ancient ruins. The attention to detail in landscapes and the character models is incredible.
Fluid Gameplay: The game introduces improved mechanics, such as stealth, archery, and combat skills, blending smooth platforming and puzzles. The exploration aspects, from climbing to finding hidden treasures, are engrossing.
Character Development: Lara Croft’s character is more fleshed out in this game. Her journey, both physical and emotional, resonates with players, as she wrestles with the loss of her father and the responsibility that comes with the secrets she uncovers.
Sound Design & Music: The atmospheric soundtrack and immersive sound effects heighten the tension and beauty of the game world. The voice acting is also well executed.
Weaknesses

Predictable Narrative: While the narrative provides some interesting twists, it often feels like a rehash of familiar tropes — the “chasing after a legendary artifact” theme is common in adventure games.
Pacing Issues: There are moments where the pacing can drag, especially in the middle portion of the game, where players might feel like they are merely going through the motions.
Too Much Focus on Combat: While the game improves combat mechanics, there are times when the combat sequences feel repetitive, detracting from the exploratory and puzzle-solving elements that make the series iconic.
Hatred
Released in 2015, Hatred is a top-down, isometric shooter game that quickly gained notoriety due to its controversial and highly violent content. The game follows a protagonist who embarks on a mass murder spree for no other reason than pure hatred towards society, aiming to kill as many people as possible before ultimately being killed by law enforcement.

Strengths

Intense Action: The game’s violence is both its main draw and its unique selling point. For players looking for mindless, chaotic violence, Hatred offers exactly that. It is an action-packed experience where players are thrust into an unforgiving world with no moral boundaries.
Simplicity: The mechanics of Hatred are straightforward: run, gun, and kill. It’s a game that doesn’t require much thought, offering a direct, no-frills gameplay experience. For some players, this simplicity can be appealing, as it doesn’t bog them down with intricate storylines or puzzles.
Controversial Appeal: The game’s willingness to push the boundaries of what’s acceptable in video games led to widespread attention. Some players enjoy the shock value, and it may resonate with those who seek controversial or anti-mainstream entertainment.
Weaknesses

Lack of Depth: Hatred is criticized for its lack of meaningful content or substance beyond its shock value. The protagonist's motivations are shallow, and the gameplay quickly becomes monotonous. It doesn’t offer much in the way of engaging mechanics outside of mindless violence.
Repetitiveness: The entire experience is centered around the repetitive act of shooting innocent civilians and law enforcement. Without any real progression, puzzles, or narrative depth, the gameplay becomes tedious very quickly.
Negative Reception: The game’s graphic nature and nihilistic themes were widely condemned. Many considered it a shallow attempt to cash in on controversy, and it was banned or censored in several regions. While some argue that it is an expression of dark humor, the majority view it as in poor taste and unnecessarily provocative.
Lack of Emotional Connection: While "Rise of the Tomb Raider" invests players emotionally in Lara’s journey, Hatred offers no connection to its protagonist, making it hard for players to invest in the game beyond surface-level violence.
Why "Hatred" Is a Better Game
While comparing these two games may seem unusual given their stark differences in tone and gameplay, there are some compelling reasons to argue that Hatred stands out in a certain niche:

Provocative Nature: Hatred does something Tomb Raider doesn't — it dares to challenge societal norms in a way that's shocking, though it can be considered distasteful by many. Its willingness to be unapologetically dark sets it apart from more polished mainstream titles.

Pure Action: If you're looking for a pure action experience with no distractions — no deep narrative, puzzles, or exploration — then Hatred may be more up your alley. It appeals to a specific audience who seeks unfiltered chaos.

Unconventional Gameplay: While Tomb Raider is a well-rounded action-adventure with some narrative depth, Hatred stands as an example of pure nihilism, which in its own right is a departure from the norm. It doesn’t try to tell a story of hope or redemption, instead focusing on raw, unrelenting violence.

Shock Value: There's a level of shock value in Hatred that Rise of the Tomb Raider cannot replicate. Whether you agree with it or not, the game’s ability to generate discussion and controversy is something few games can achieve in such a blunt way.

Conclusion
Ultimately, whether Hatred is a “better” game than Tomb Raider: Rise of the Tomb Raider depends entirely on what you’re looking for. If you want a rich narrative, immersive environments, and rewarding gameplay, then Tomb Raider is the superior choice. However, if you are intrigued by the raw, unrefined action and desire a game that challenges conventional norms, Hatred could appeal to those who are looking for a different kind of experience.

In the end, the gaming world is vast, and each game offers something distinct — it’s about finding the experience that best suits your taste.

Impresionante! Rise of the Tomb Raider es, sin duda, una de las aventuras más gratas que he tenido el placer de jugar. Desde el momento en que empieza, te sumerge en un mundo increíblemente detallado, con paisajes impresionantes y una narrativa cautivadora que logra mantener el interés en todo momento. La mezcla de exploración, acción y resolución de acertijos está perfectamente balanceada, ofreciendo una experiencia dinámica y emocionante.

El desarrollo del personaje de Lara Croft es profundo y bien construido, lo que hace que conectes emocionalmente con ella y su viaje. Además, los gráficos son sobresalientes, con una atención al detalle que realmente da vida al mundo del juego. Las mecánicas de combate y sigilo también son muy satisfactorias, permitiéndote enfrentar los desafíos de diversas maneras según tu estilo.

En resumen, Rise of the Tomb Raider no solo cumple, sino que supera las expectativas, consolidándose como un título imprescindible para los amantes de la acción y la aventura. ¡Totalmente recomendado!

In my opinion, Rise of the Tomb Raider is an outstanding game and a remarkable improvement over its predecessor. The story is incredibly engaging and exceptionally well-written, keeping me hooked from start to finish. The side missions are genuinely enjoyable and provide meaningful additions to the overall experience.

That said, collecting documents feels a bit mixed to me—while the Trinity-related documents offer fascinating insights, others seem less impactful. However, I find hunting for relics, deciphering languages to unlock Monoliths and earn coins, and exploring the world rewarding. The progression system, with its ability points, upgrades, and the option to purchase weapons and gear using coins, is satisfying and adds depth to the gameplay.

All things considered, I wholeheartedly recommend this game. A must-play!

This game has good graphics and the many settings look awesome, even though I wasn't always able to appreciate it that much. But also the fights feel better than in its predecessor("tomb raider"). 184646623.review:
Rise of the Tomb Raider – An Exceptional Adventure with a Few Caveats
Recommended with Reservations

As someone who has loved the Tomb Raider franchise, Rise of the Tomb Raider delivered an enthralling experience. The game's visuals are stunning, the gameplay mechanics feel polished, and Lara's journey to uncover the lost city of Kitezh is as gripping as it is action-packed. The mix of combat, exploration, and puzzle-solving creates a well-rounded adventure that keeps you engaged for hours.

The story's focus on survival and uncovering ancient mysteries is expertly tied into gameplay. The Siberian wilderness is an absolute joy to explore, with hidden tombs offering satisfying challenges. The upgrade system and crafting mechanics add depth, giving you plenty of reasons to scour every corner of the map.

However, while I thoroughly enjoyed the game, I must point out an element that might not sit well with all players—myself included. The narrative delves deeply into religious and philosophical themes, particularly surrounding immortality and divine power. Without spoiling much, the storyline occasionally leans heavily into mystical elements rooted in Christian tradition and pseudo-spirituality. For some, this can feel out of place or even discomforting depending on personal beliefs or philosophical inclinations.

While this might not bother every player, I found certain moments where the game’s religious undertones detracted from my immersion. At times, the themes felt too overt, and I wished for a more balanced or neutral approach.

That said, if you can look past these elements or see them as part of the fantasy lore, there’s so much to love about Rise of the Tomb Raider. The gameplay alone is worth the price of admission, and the story—despite my reservations—is undeniably compelling.

If you’re a fan of action-adventure games or the Tomb Raider series, this is still a strong recommendation. Just be aware that the narrative might venture into territories that not everyone will feel comfortable exploring.

Rating: 8.5/10
(Recommended, but with philosophical/religious caveats)

184643605.review:
很难想象这是一款2016年的游戏，不论是画质或是动作的连贯性都做得近乎完美，用冷兵器战斗时的打击感也非常到位。劳拉的建模实在是太美了，干净的马尾加上一套探险家的行头，在外观上非常的吸引人。漂亮的画质和恰到好处的音乐与CG让人在游玩过程中非常容易沉浸其中，仿佛花10几个小时在和主角一起演出一台热血非凡的动作电影。通过技能加点和武器改装可以拓展出各种各样的玩法，我在玩的时候把刺杀与射箭技能点的比较多，在许多关卡中都采用潜行的方式进行推进，各种暗杀方式让我想起了以前玩刺客信条的时候，隐藏自己的踪迹伺机而动总能带给人很大乐趣。关卡的解谜难度一般，复杂的地方经过几次尝试也基本可以得出可靠的方法来过关，总体难度不大，一次次到达光柱还是很有成就感的。故事的主线剧情在今天看来或许有点老套，主人公孤军对抗敌营的模式或许有点落于窠臼，但是游戏把“勇气”这个母题还是演绎的非常精彩。
游戏的地图基本上都是半开放式的，但是如果想要做各种品类的全收集的话，会造成比较久的跑图时间，碎片化的录音和遗物文件需要不断拼凑，但是体现的可能只是对故事背景的较小的补充，个人不太喜欢这样的模式，在前几张图做了全收集之后，后面就是直接跑的主线，感觉直接跑主线玩线性更加连贯，喜欢收集的可以通过后面传送来找。
整部游戏就是一场比较长的电影，劳拉的坚定信念与勇气永远可以带给人热血鼓舞。

184565409.review:
Rise of the Tomb Raider lleva la fórmula que hizo grande a su predecesor a nuevas alturas, ofreciendo una aventura impresionante que combina acción, exploración y un gran desarrollo de personajes. El juego mejora la jugabilidad con escenarios más amplios, mayor variedad de puzzles y una historia que profundiza en la evolución de Lara Croft como una heroína. Las gráficas son deslumbrantes, con paisajes bellamente detallados que realmente te hacen sentir en el corazón de Siberia mientras exploras tumbas y ruinas.

El sistema de combate es sólido, y el sigilo juega un papel importante, lo que le da algo de variedad a las peleas. Además, la mecánica de supervivencia, como la caza de animales y la recolección de recursos, añade una capa extra de inmersión.

Aunque el juego es muy disfrutable, en ocasiones puede sentirse un poco repetitivo, especialmente en sus secciones de combate y exploración. Algunas de las mecánicas no están completamente pulidas, y aunque la historia es buena, no tiene el mismo impacto que otros títulos similares.

A pesar de estos detalles, Rise of the Tomb Raider es una excelente continuación de la saga y una aventura muy completa. Le doy un 8/10 por su jugabilidad entretenida, sus impresionantes gráficos y la forma en que sigue desarrollando a Lara Croft.

184466655.review:
Évaluation : 🌟🌟🌟🌟✨ (4.5/5)
"Un voyage épique mêlant exploration, action et une Lara Croft plus humaine que jamais."

Rise of the Tomb Raider, développé par Crystal Dynamics, est une superbe suite qui perfectionne la formule établie par le reboot de 2013. Ce jeu allie une narration captivante, des environnements magnifiques, et un gameplay bien équilibré entre exploration, énigmes et combat. Une aventure mémorable qui met en avant le développement émotionnel et physique de Lara Croft.

Les Points Forts :
✅ Visuels époustouflants : Les paysages, allant de la Sibérie glaciale à des ruines antiques, sont à couper le souffle. Les effets de lumière et de neige renforcent l’immersion.

✅ Un excellent mélange de gameplay : Le jeu combine habilement l’action, la plateforme, et des énigmes dans les tombeaux. Ces derniers, bien que facultatifs, sont parmi les moments les plus gratifiants du jeu.

✅ Narration immersive : Lara est confrontée à ses propres doutes et motivations dans une quête personnelle pour découvrir la vérité derrière un mystère archéologique. L'histoire est captivante et bien rythmée.

✅ Progression et personnalisation : Grâce à un système d’arbres de compétences et de crafting, vous pouvez adapter Lara à votre style de jeu, que ce soit furtif, axé sur le combat, ou orienté vers l’exploration.

✅ Enigmes des tombeaux : Les tombeaux secondaires sont de vrais joyaux, offrant des défis intelligents et variés. Ils rappellent les racines classiques de la série.

✅ Combats dynamiques : L’intelligence artificielle des ennemis, combinée à des environnements interactifs, rend chaque affrontement intéressant. Lara peut passer d’un combat brutal à une infiltration furtive selon la situation.

Les Points Faibles :
⚠️ Scénario prévisible : Bien que bien racontée, l’histoire principale peut parfois sembler un peu clichée et manque d’audace dans ses twists.

⚠️ Monde semi-ouvert sous-utilisé : Certains espaces ouverts sont magnifiques, mais manquent parfois d’activités intéressantes en dehors des quêtes principales et de la collecte d’objets.

⚠️ Quêtes secondaires peu mémorables : Bien que quelques-unes soient intéressantes, la plupart des quêtes annexes manquent de profondeur narrative.

En conclusion :
Rise of the Tomb Raider est un jeu d’aventure captivant qui excelle dans presque tous les aspects. Il offre une expérience équilibrée, mêlant action intense, exploration riche, et réflexion stimulante. Bien qu’il puisse manquer d’audace dans son récit, il compense largement avec son gameplay varié et ses environnements somptueux.

🎮 Verdict final :
Un incontournable pour les amateurs d’aventure et d’action, et une superbe étape dans l’évolution de Lara Croft. Préparez-vous à explorer des tombeaux, affronter des ennemis redoutables, et survivre dans des conditions extrêmes.

⏳ Temps de jeu recommandé : 20 à 25 heures pour l’histoire principale avec un peu d’exploration, plus si vous visez la complétion à 100 %.
✨ Note personnelle : Rien de tel que résoudre un puzzle dans un tombeau glacé, tout en admirant les détails visuels impeccables. Lara Croft n’a jamais été aussi impressionnante ! 🏹🌍✨

  刚开始游玩我是被主角劳拉的颜值所吸引，可能是某些游戏的女性角色实在是一言难尽，但是抛开其他游戏的女性角色的对比不谈，劳拉真的可以说是我的“女神”！不仅是外表的美丽，她坚定的信念和不懈的冒险精神也深刻地打动着我。人们总说第一印象都是看颜值的，这也成为我在2024年游玩这么一款相对来说算是老游戏的动力。
  然而游玩一段时间后，我更是被其中解谜的过程所震撼，可以说我不是一个爱动脑筋的人，初中的时候同学们喜欢玩密室逃脱之类的解谜游戏我都不喜欢，我就爱玩一些像《王者荣耀》这样的简单粗暴的宝宝游戏。但在玩了《古墓丽影：崛起》后，我开始沉迷于每一个主线和支线上的解谜，虽然起初还是想了解劳拉“女神”的故事，但是当我真正开始解谜，我真的不由地感叹其设计的精妙！
  在一次次解谜中，我也能感受到主角“劳拉”的成长，这款游戏的叙事我也非常的喜欢。画面而言，虽然是在这个电子科技水平的发展迅速的当下，还是一款比较老的游戏，我依然认为《古墓丽影：崛起》的画质不算差，并没有掉队，应该算得上是中等偏上了。在战斗场面和剧情的放映上也能给我耳目一新的感觉。
  当然伴随着劳拉”女神“的成长与故事秘密的揭晓，我也开始改变我对游戏的看法，这真的可以称为第九艺术，从完全不喜欢动脑玩游戏到我开始思考每一个密室的机关，我也开始会尝试我从未尝试过的游戏了。我一定会玩完这款游戏的！
  最后，真的非常喜欢这款游戏，也是趁着”冬促“把《古墓丽影》重启三部曲都买完了，不止是为劳拉买单，更是因为这系列作品给我带来的惊喜！（嘿嘿，劳拉真香）

184437330.review:
I love Lara Croft, I wish women were real 

Even after nearly 10 years, this game holds up so well. Back when "AAA" actually meant something, where you get a highly polished, well animated and detailed game with ~20 hours of content. The story is corny at times but it's like watching an action movie with strong beats despite the melodrama. 

The best part about this game is the level design, you will never have to look up a guide for any puzzle or platforming section. It's very intuitive and the platforming itself if better than Uncharted, IMO. 

Great game and if you still haven't played it, it's worth the buy. The third game is free on game pass, fyi.

184436479.review:
[i] Der perfekte Nachfolger! [/i]
Rise of the Tomb Raider baut auf allem auf, was der Vorgänger gut gemacht hat und verbessert es in nahezu jeder Hinsicht. Die offene Spielwelt fühlt sich lebendiger und abwechslungsreicher an, die optionalen Gräber sind kreativer und es macht unglaublich viel Spaß, das Spiel auf 100% zu vervollständigen. Besonders die Balance zwischen Action, Erkundung und Rätseln ist hervorragend gelungen. Es gibt kaum etwas Negatives zu sagen. Dieses Spiel ist ein absolutes Highlight, das ich jedem nur ans Herz legen kann!
Rating: 10/10

184432449.review:
I skipped 90% of the "game" since 90% is based on filler content + irrelevant cutscenes where lara either is moaning or falling off something and moaning after. The other cutscenes are based on a chopper that is flying towords a horizon leading me to the next "questmarker".
Well and the 10% were okay, most cutscenes that are actually story related or lore related are just people talking about the artifact and Lara is always just asking "oh yes? TeLl Me MoRe AbOuT iT" - like she never heard of it - even in end game.
I also skipped all the trash artifacts that are optional (still collected them because they were there) and also I found "lore" every 20 meters in game in form of MP3 files + text - yay (skipped them all because annoying and boring).
They could have implemented all this lore inside the actual game and cutscenes, yet they gave you some collectable MP3 files and you cant even play and listen to them - what makes it worse at this point.
Not to mention the dumb backtracking in this game. Especially if you do quests from NPCs, they will just send you back to the places that you already discovered.

The main story is full of logical nonsense btw. It gives you the feeling like this shit would never happened in first place and it just feels so made up and fake. I dont know who was writing the story but I hope the dude got fired. 

Really lazy game, a lot of climbing bugs and even riddle related bugs that I found - and this game is actually so old already, its crazy that those bugs never got fixed in first place.
I think the worst part are the "DLCs".
One of them you run through Laras House collecting more text and lore - this time about lara herself and her daddy issues (rich kids problem). Trust me, its not worth it, the riddles are so dumb aswell (I never finished it because this stuff was just so boring!!!).

Second "DLC" is apperantly a chellange mode where you just shoot around in the house, trying to get a nice score for whatever reason...
I didnt even launched that shit at this point btw.

I hope shadow of the tomb raider will be less boring, less lara falling down and moans once again with less choppers at the horizon and more actual story with no backtracking and nonsense with content filler.
I clearly wasted my money on that one.

184368453.review:
Einfach nur ein gelungener Reboot der Reihe.
Ein zeitgemäßes Tomb Raider, bei dem die Protagonistin auch nicht nur Diskussionen wegen ihrer "Polygone" entfacht. Ein bisschen Action mit einigen Rätseln, guter Story, guter Ansatz mit dem Levelsystem und den Skills dazu. Die Ladezeiten sind soweit auch gut versteckt durch diverse "wir quetschen uns hier durch"-Szenen. Verschiedene Level, gute Mechaniken mit Seilen, Pfeilen, Eispickel und Waffengewalt, die man teils umgehen kann oder zumindest als Stealth angehen kann - auch wenn ich dann häufig in turbulenten "Shooterszenen" rausgekommen bin, weil Stealth + ich = funktioniert nicht.
Grafisch sieht es gut aus, dazu mit verschiedenen Outfits für Lara.

So gut manche der alten Titel damals auch waren, das Reboot hat sie definitiv geschlagen und gefällt mir tatsächlich auch besser als Uncharted.

It's a very fun game of go here, kill those enemies and loot everything, go back and loot more areas then do it over and over again because some areas require a specific item to progress further till you finish the game.

The issues however is mostly on how the game was made. Somehow, this is buggier and glitcher than the first Tomb Raider reboot. There this one section where Lara fights in a burning building and I had to fight blind since the fire glitches into the screen covering everything or when you're knocked near a spot you can crouch on, you clip through the map. Thankfully there's extra bit of land that you can parkour in to get up. Sometimes the glitch is useful especially when you turn a corner and the enemies are just t-posing, still aggressive, but can't move. They can only yell. You also need to verify the integrity of game files every single day because the game sometimes crashes while fast traveling.

If you can ignore that, the game is very fun, especially the shotgun.

This 9 year old game has incredible gameplay and graphics (it looks better than many modern titles, I think game graphics peaked 2016-2020). I beat it in 2017 and at the time even though I had a 1080ti and overall high-end system, I could not run any games truly maxed out. Now I have a 7900XTX and 7950X3D and can run almost anything maxed out and still get over 100fps @1440p UW. This game is incredibly beautiful. And the gameplay holds up in 2024. I remember liking this game in 2017, and I think i'm going to still like it in 2024. 

BTW, I played Shadow a couple years ago and hated it. Though the gameplay loop is similar to Rise, the story was bland and the world was boring imo. I also struggled with the puzzles in Shadow. Some of the puzzles made no logical sense, and a good puzzle must be logical. 

I think Rise might be the best TR game ever. I hope they release a new one.

184031786.review:
História
 • A história segue Lara Croft em sua busca por um segredo antigo que pode mudar o destino da humanidade. Ela enfrenta desafios perigosos, enquanto lida com dilemas pessoais e com a pressão de se tornar a heroína que sempre sonhou. O enredo é envolvente, com bom desenvolvimento de personagem, embora o ritmo em alguns momentos possa parecer arrastado.

Jogabilidade (Nota: 8/10)
 • A jogabilidade é sólida, com combates dinâmicos e exploração envolvente. No entanto, os combates podem se tornar repetitivos ao longo do jogo, e as mecânicas de stealth, embora boas, poderiam ser mais exploradas. A adição de novas habilidades e ferramentas é um ponto positivo.

Gráficos (Nota: 10/10)
 • Os gráficos são impressionantes, com cenários incrivelmente detalhados e uma iluminação que contribui para uma atmosfera imersiva. Desde as montanhas geladas até as ruínas antigas, tudo é visualmente deslumbrante e contribui para a imersão no jogo.


Conclusão:
Rise of the Tomb Raider (2015) é uma continuação sólida da franquia, com gráficos de alto nível e uma boa história, mas com alguns momentos de combate repetitivos. No geral, é uma excelente experiência. Nota 8.

183992704.review:
[h2] 游戏体量 [/h2]
笔者11.5小时通关主线，64%完成度，总体来说游戏体量并不大。

[h2] 画质及叙事方式 [/h2]
游戏的画面质感非常惊艳，除了水和火的特效有些粗糙，以及建模精细程度不及今日之外，其他方面都非常顶级，让人很难想象这竟然是10年前的游戏。游戏的叙事方式也比较特别，像是在看一场电影一样，现在这样电影化叙事的游戏真的不多

[h2] 剧情 [/h2]
笔者没有玩过第九代，所以本代的剧情只是看了个大概，就目前个人认为剧情总体来说比较平庸，而且很多剧情的逻辑非常不合理或者相当牵强，除了安娜的转变让人有些吃惊以外，其他的并没有太过出彩之处（后续会补完第九代，此处的评价可能会修改）

[h2] 玩法/可玩性 [/h2]
游戏主要有三种玩法：战斗，古墓解谜，跑酷。战斗方面体验不错，武器有四种，还有不同种类的道具。但是战斗很单一且难度不高，基本上就是劳拉走到一个地方被发现然后就开始四处刷怪，所谓boss也就是几个重甲兵，在不开高难度的情况下战斗难度较低，乐趣较少；古墓解谜的谜题就我体验的三个非主线古墓和主线古墓来说难度一般，比较友好，除了最后大结局时的解谜有些繁琐之外，其余的都很容易，探索古墓给的奖励也比较给力；跑酷方面这个游戏处理的很聪明。跑酷的地形来来回回就那几种，难免会厌，游戏每过一段主线剧情就给你一个跑酷相关的特殊道具，以此保持新鲜感，不得不说这招确实有效，反正在我这11个小时的体验中并没有对此感到厌倦过。可玩性方面还算不错，有收集，有支线任务，有非主线古墓，不过对于我这种过了主线就不再想玩的玩家来说没什么区别。

[h2] 个人评分[/h2]
[h1] 8.5/10 [/h1]
扣分项：1.过短的主线剧情以及部分剧情中牵强的逻辑 -0.5 2.战斗单一的玩法-1

183988721.review: 2024.12.28通关主线 这一代相较于9代具有更加出色的游戏玩法 解密的趣味性也大大增加 所有功能全面提升 电影式的叙事方法得到保留 同时 科技点的多样性让着一部作品有几分刺客信条的味道 主线流程与上代差不多 但支线的流程大大提高 剧情方面 补充了劳拉父亲的死因与他所追寻的目标 值得一提的是 这作boss的设计从日本武士改成了直升飞机 历史也由日本改为了拜占庭  可以说这是一部非常出色的线性剧情游戏

183958788.review:
Оценка: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
Проходил на Xbox 
Rise of the Tomb Raider — это тот случай, когда сиквел реально лучше оригинала. Лара вернулась, и её новое приключение стало ещё масштабнее, красивее и опаснее. Если первая часть была о становлении Лары, то здесь она уже настоящая расхитительница гробниц.

🎮 Геймплей

Здесь всё на максималках: больше экшена, больше головоломок, больше свободы в исследовании. Арсенал оружия стал шире, а боёвка разнообразнее. Стелс-сегменты стали проработаннее, теперь ты можешь сливаться с кустами, устраивать засады и реально чувствовать себя охотницей.

А гробницы? Вот они, настоящие звёзды шоу. Каждая — это уникальная загадка с крутым дизайном. Зачастую ты просто залипаешь на деталях и думаешь: "Как же это круто сделано!"

🏔️ Локации

Сибирь! Холод, снег, горы — всё это выглядит невероятно атмосферно. Динамическая погода, фауна, опасности — ты реально чувствуешь, что борешься не только с врагами, но и с природой. Мир стал больше, чем в первой части, и в нём реально есть что изучать.

🌟 Лара

Лара в этой игре стала ещё круче. Она всё так же сильная и независимая, но её человечность и внутренняя борьба раскрываются ещё глубже. Её мотивация — найти ответы о своей семье и тайне бессмертия — делает сюжет эмоциональным и увлекательным.

🥂 Итог

Rise of the Tomb Raider — это сиквел мечты. Всё, за что мы полюбили первую часть, здесь сделано в разы лучше. Эта игра не просто развлекает, она втягивает тебя в свой мир с головой.

"Мы всё ещё не знаем, на что способны. Только время покажет, кто мы такие на самом деле." — Лара Крофт.

[h2][b]Геймплей:[/b][/h2]
- Дуже якісно зроблений шутерний елемент, з гарно збалансованою прокачкою, можливістю крафту та варіативністю білдів. Вороги відчуваються не пластмасовими, є різні шляхи їх вбивства, стелс само собою, але й мордобій вітається. 
- В деяких випадках кривуватий мувмент з паркуром, але в цілому приємний. Пострибати доведеться багацько, та й різні інструменти для подолання висот та перепон, що відкриваються на різних етапах, додають грі плюсів. 
- Також присутні загадки, над деякими потрібно суттєво задуматись, а в деяких треба бути просто трошки уважнішим, ніж зазвичай. 

[h2][b]Графіка:[/b][/h2]
- Для свого часу шокуюча та захоплююча. Відкриваюча сцена в засніжених горах тільки додає бали розробникам та змушує проходити гру далі заради таких соковитих картинок. Не сказати, що на теперішній момент - прямо вау, але дасть прикурити багатьом новішим тайтлам. 
- Катсцени поставлені добре. Деякі ігрові скріптовані моменти видаються доволі безшовними та не відволікають, а навпаки, занурюють у атмосферу небезпечних пригод.

[h2][b]Сюжет: !NO SPOILERS![/b][/h2]
- А тепер до головних мінусів. Сценаристи мали написати сюжет до гри, але, можливо, навіть не вийшли на роботу, та довелось комусь з айтішників закривати питання. 
- Початок гри хоча й дуже клішований, але  терпимий. А от чим ближче кінець дійства, тим абсурдніше стає розвиток подій. Доходить до нескінченних фейспалмів та запитань: «ну хто це придумував?». 
- Головний сюжет видається крейзі, деякі менші за масштабом ігрові ситуації не поступаються головному безглуздю.

[h2][b]Загальна оцінка: 7.5/10[/b][/h2]
- Якщо рахувати переваги та недоліки, то скоріше гра нот бед. Сюжет цілковито підкачав, проте все інше на висоті (буквально лол).
- Проєкт намагається бути Uncharted про Лару Крофт, і це не погано. Звісно ця епопея не варта й нігтя історій Натана Дрейка, та якщо абстрагуватись від невдалого рішення сценаристів, то цілком можна кайфанути від гри.
- Проходиться за кілька вечорів, являє собою позитивний експірієнс. Поціновувачам Індіани Джонс та інших альпіністів не проходити повз.

183697740.review:
[h1]El punto máximo de la trilogía [/h1]

[h3]Puntaje 91 [/h3]

En esta segunda entrega de la trilogía Tomb Raider comenzada en 2013 controlaremos una Lara Croft más madura que en la entrega anterior, ya no es la joven Lara de la entrega del 2013 donde íbamos aprendiendo todo lo necesario para la aventura. En esta entrega Lara es una aventurera experimentada que va a Siberia y se enfrenta a una organización terrorista que busca la fuente de la inmortalidad, al mejor estilo de las películas de Indiana Jones.

La ambientación en las montañas de Siberia, mezclado con antiguos restos de expediciones soviéticas está muy bien lograda y crean un escenario memorable, transmitiendo al jugador de muy buena manera la sensación de estar en una montaña ventosa y fría estos tramos de la aventura.

Los gráficos han mejorado mucho con respecto a la entrega anterior y están totalmente vigentes al momento de esta reseña ocho años después. Se nota mucho que el juego se trabajó mucho con respecto al anterior en los tres años de diferencia que los separan. En mi experiencia está mejor optimizado que el primero y prácticamente no recuerdo ningún bug durante toda la aventura.

Mantiene y mejora también el apartado de tumbas opcionales, agregando también más desafíos y coleccionables para los más completistas. En esta versión estos desafíos parecen más trabajados que en una primera versión ya que no se sienten repetitivos.

Luego de haber jugado las tres entregas de esta trilogía es notorio que esta es la mejor trabajada, y por eso a mi entender sobrepasa el umbral de los 90 puntos, entrando en los juegos memorables del año 2015, año en el que salio para Xbox, en 2016 sale para PC y PS4.

Además en esta entrega ya está implementado el nado, punto faltante en la entrega anterior en comparación con la entrega anterior y las versiones anteriores de la saga que sí lo tenía.

No entendí lo del pase de batalla y no me intereso entenderlo tampoco, no lo necesita.

A continuación evaluó las primeras cuatro etiquetas de Steam para calificar que tan bien categorizado está por la plataforma.

[b]Aventura: [/b] Esta etiqueta y la segunda definen el género al que pertenece, acción aventura. 

[b]Acción:[/b] Aplicamos el mismo criterio que con la etiqueta anterior.

[b]Protagonista Femenina: [/b] Lara Croft, la protagonista femenina más importante de la historia del videojuego

[b]Puzles: [/b] Los hay como en la entrega de 2013 y han mejorado mucho. Si evaluamos esta etiqueta individualmente puede que no sea al género al que aplica principalmente y debería tenerse en cuenta que siempre es en el marco del género acción aventura

[i]Puntaje: Para mi evaluación de puntajes utilizó la escala Emilio Gonzalez Moreira pero bajo mi propio criterio. Para más información de la escala Emilio Gonzalez Moreria ver https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GvQbVvZlH4w&t=2732s

Mi experiencia: Las reseñas son una apreciación personal tras haber completado el juego en su línea de juego principal, por lo que no incluye una evaluación ni desde punto de vista completista ni “tryhard”. Mi experiencia en videojuegos va desde 1989 en consolas, y en PC desde 1999, pasando por todas las generaciones de consolas, incluidos arcades. Actualmente si bien mis reseñas son en Steam me considero un jugador de consolas en PC, ya que la mayoría de los juegos aquí reseñados son jugados con joystick preferentemente cuando es la interfaz más adecuada. [/i]

183696511.review:
I preferred the premise of the original - stranded on an island with a bunch of cultists. However this is more than a worthy follow up. Crystal dynamics have more spectacle, mysticism and Nazi's (read: Trinity) than your average Indiana Jones movies (the good ones). The cinematic set pieces keep things going and there's plenty of collectables and optional tombs for the explorers or you're able to power on through the story (something about chasing a macguffin, ultimate power, blah blah blah). 

Sadly, combat suffers from 'doom barrel' syndrome with strategically placed items to take down bad guys and I always get the feeling that this could be a lot more free-from than what it actually is. Some of the mechanisms are a bit silly (climbing arrows anyone?) and a whole city with an ancient army under the ground makes no effort to keep the story grounded. As for playtime - well you can burn through the main story in under 10 hours, but this is a game to take time in and explore a little. 

It's all incredibly polished, and with it's cinematic gameplay a lot of fun (give or take a fetch quest). With the option to revisit maps and challenges after completing the main story there's enough to keep players going. Under £4 on sale with the season pass and additional goodies its well worth it.

183660230.review:
Rise of the Tomb Raider é tudo o que um fã de Tomb Raider poderia sonhar — uma verdadeira evolução da franquia, com um Lara Croft mais amadurecida, mais destemida e mais humana do que nunca. O jogo não é apenas uma sequência, é uma obra de arte que combina exploração, ação e um enredo profundo com uma dose extra de emoção. A forma como Lara enfrenta seus desafios, não apenas físicos, mas emocionais, é o que realmente distingue este jogo. Não é só sobre encontrar artefatos ou explorar tumbas antigas — é sobre a luta interna dela, o dilema entre o destino de ser uma caçadora de tumbas e sua busca por significado e conexão com o passado.

A jogabilidade é refinada ao extremo, com o combate e a exploração sendo mais fluidos e dinâmicos do que em qualquer outro título da franquia. O sistema de escalada e exploração oferece uma sensação de liberdade impressionante, enquanto as tumbas e enigmas são mais complexos e recompensadores. A forma como a natureza interage com Lara é magistral, desde a neve caindo nas montanhas até o som dos passos dela nas cavernas. Não há dúvida de que Rise of the Tomb Raider é um dos melhores jogos de ação e aventura já feitos, e a Lara Croft que ele apresenta é a verdadeira heroína — resiliente, inteligente e sempre pronta para enfrentar o impossível. Este é um jogo que não só honra o legado da série, mas o redefine para uma nova geração. Nota: 10/10 — um jogo épico que vai deixar os fãs de Tomb Raider em êxtase.

183640187.review:
Well that was an experience and a half. It was a good sequel, much better than I had expected. It is to be noted though, that with this sequel, we have a Lara Croft that is now even more different than the OG one. That is subject to taste. I don't mind it, but knowing that that point was a major source of complaint for the 1st game, I'd imagine this one might rub some people in the wrong way...or rub more salt to the wound, if you get what I mean. 

The story. Simple, to the point and extremely safe. I am fine with it honestly, because I don't expect anything ground breaking in the story in a Tomb Raider game. Your overarching goal is to find the macguffin that eluded your late father for the later part of his life, especially post your mother's demise. And you get into a lot of shenanigans along the way. Add a sprinkle of family drama and religious mysticism...and that's the story basically. The characters are pretty shallow and the story-telling is evidently more plot driven than character driven. You have a race-swapped Jonah, who is a very caring older brother character to Lara - and nothing more. Ana, her 'stepmother' has some interesting developments. Recent additions like Jacob and Sofia are pretty one-note for their screen-time. The main antagonist, Konstantin of Trinity, has a pretty messed up storyline, but it doesn't hit as hard as I might have liked. Nothing is bad, of course - just very inoffensive and moderate. Unlike the first game, the collectibles do not actually flesh them out beyond their in game characterisations, so that is a bummer. There is nothing much to say about the story to be honest, except that it is extremely safe and works fine. 

The gameplay feels much more fluid than the first game. We do have new tools and interesting combat mechanics, some of them do kind of make the game too easy to be honest. My mind immediately goes to the true-shot triple-arrow mechanic which makes stealth even easier than it already is - even at extreme survivor difficulty. Poison arrows is the other thing that comes to mind. We do have helmetted enemies eventually, but poison arrows break those and all the shielded enemies swiftly. We have a better fire arrow, lore-wise...since the first game literally saw us burning arrow tips with nothing but a lighter. Weird nitpick I know, but I didn't mention it in my review for the first game due to it being a weird nitpick. The gameplay is quite the same, just with some more tools and a bit more fluidity. It isn't an Arkham City to Arkham Knight leap. Just more of the same, but with more polish. And also, you can sprint here...almost forgot about that.

The exploration is truly a mixed bag. I was pretty positive at the exploration of the first game. Here, I am very divided. We have hard gate-kept collectibles. The monoliths for coin pouches are hard-gated. You can't find any coin pouches without reading the related monolith first - you're literally not allowed to find them - and you can't read the monoliths without levelling up you language. That forces back-peddling and that is a bad design choice. There is also a softer gate-lock with survival caches, which only glimmer if you look in their direction. They aren't hard-locked, but still extremely difficult to find without finding the corresponding explorer satchel first. Now that the negatives are out oft he way, let's get into the positives. The tombs are awesome. Each optional or story related tomb feels different and actually stimulate my monkey-brain to turn human for once. I enjoyed every single one of them and they kept me wanting for more - even if I genuinely feel that the quantity of tombs is perfect. The crafting system also feels very good and the difference after each upgrade is felt. Hunting, foraging and salvaging did not feel tiresome at all and the reward at the end of exploration feels substantial. The collectibles themselves do not add too much to the story, nor do they give any context to the actions of the characters beyond what one can reasonably deduce through the main storyline itself. It does give context to the main antagonist's motives in a twisted way, which was okay...but the potential was greater than the actual output. 

_______________________________________________________________________

Game modes:

Score Attack: I'll keep this short, fuck Score Attack and its related achievements. 

Cold Darkness: Generic zombie mode, but with collectibles for some weird reason. The lore isn't interesting at all, so the only incentive of collecting them is the related achievements. And yeah, fuck its achievements as well.

Expeditions: This was fire. The mechanics were simple, intuitive and doing it with a fried makes the journey much more enjoyable. It isn't difficult in the slightest - but a very fun game mode. The achievements here are organically challenging and require at least 2 playthroughs to obtain all.

Lara's Nightmare: Trash, but not offensively trash like score attack. And again, fuck score attack.

Blood Ties: A puzzle-based story DLC, which was actually pretty fun to go through. It is more of a collectathon mode which mainly dives into the bittersweet story of Lara's parents. The puzzles are intuitive and fun to crack - not difficult, but fun. Fine addition.
_______________________________________________________________________

6.5/10...the multiplayer achievements are not as egregious as the first game, so I am excusing it...albeit a bit reluctantly.

183609746.review:
This game is everything that the first game wanted to be, but never was. 

Where the first game had a mostly uninteresting story featuring goofy/flat characters (I am looking at you, Father Matthias), the story here is incredible by comparison, but also just good on its own. Lara is a strong, yet vulnerable and empathetic protagonist, and her presence grounds this fantastical world in a way that makes it emotionally believable. Beyond Lara, Ana and Konstantin are a highlight: They make for great villains, as we are able to understand their motives, and even somewhat empathise with them, while still making it very easy to root for their downfall.
Moreover, the story does a much better job than the first game to deliver the classic Tomb-Raider-esque archeaological mysticism while still telling a deeply human story about loss, betrayal, guilt, duty and friendship.

In terms of its gameplay, this is where Rise of the Tomb Raider really shines in my opinion. Where the first game was incredibly linear despite appearing otherwise, this world, while segmented into different areas, actually deserves the title of "Open World". There are a decent amount of tombs and side activities. The open level design also now allows for the player to actually play according to his own taste, rather than being forced into linear shooting segments every few minutes. While they certainly feature here too, I was pleasantly surprised by how many times I was able to sneak my way through levels and play in my own way. This freedom of choice is complemented by a much better weapon variety and a much more fleshed out skilltree.

In general, this game is leaps and bounds above its predecessor, but more than just being a great Tomb Raider, it stands alone as a genuinely good Action Adventure that is sure to provide plentiful entertainment for 50+ hours, especially with all  the DLC that give a good layer of extra content.

Final Rating: 8/10. Thank you for coming to my TED Talk.

183549005.review:
Rise of the Tomb Raider is the sequel to the highly acclaimed Tomb Raider (2013) reboot and expands on nearly every aspect of its predecessor. We continue Lara Croft's story as she seeks to uncover the lost city of Kitezh, only whispered in legend, which could hold the secret to achieving immortality. Lara's father had spent years looking for this place, but did not live long enough to succeed. Lara thus has an almost obsessive need to complete her father's work and prove that he was right to devote his life searching for it. However, a sinister organization known only as "Trinity" is also racing to get there first and claim the spoils. This game showcases a more experienced and confident Lara, and further develops her character as the game progresses. The secondary characters, as well as antagonists, take on more prominent roles and are likewise better developed than the previous game. The story is not terrible by any means, and I did enjoy it for the most part, but it does seem to borrow some aspects from previous adventures, and at times feels slightly recycled. 

As is expected this sequel continues to blend combat, exploration, puzzles and platforming elements. And all of these have seen improvements. The combat and stealth systems have been expanded with more weapons and items to take enemies down with. Platforming is a joy and generally works well, with fluid movements and plenty of environmental objects to use. Occasionally there are some issues with the odd camera angle that cause me to die during a jump. The tombs are more intricate and a lot more is involved in solving them. Exploration plays a much larger role, with a more open world that players can spend a decent amount of time getting lost in. Of course there are still linear levels as well. The crafting system has been made more complex; we can personalize weapons and outfits and resource gathering is also more in-depth as much needs to found within the environment. 

As with the former game, the visuals in Rise are outstanding. There are various different and highly detailed environments from snowy and icy mountaintops, to swamps to dense forests. The weather effects are realistic, the lighting is gorgeous and the whole package brings the world to life. Lara's character model remains as detailed and polished as any I've seen. Some of the same voice actors, including that for Lara, return with stellar performances. 

Rise does away with the traditional multiplayer mode we had in the first (which wasn't all that great to begin with) and adds a co-op mode which is a lot more engaging. I had a lot of fun completing the challenges with a friend in this survival style mode. Our characters need to stay warm and fed as the game progresses which adds an interesting dynamic to the Tomb Raider experience. 

Rise of the Tomb Raider improves on pretty much everything introduced previously. The combat and gameplay are fluid, puzzles are a lot more fun, the crafting system is in-depth, visuals are top-tier, and even the story does an admirable job. Lara continues to evolve into the heroine we all knew and this has become one of my favourite action adventure games out there.
